data.lyric:
[ti:Nat King Cole / The Christmas Song (Merry Christmas To You)]
[ar:Nat King Cole]
[al:Absolute Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.38]Nat King Cole / The Christmas Song (Merry Christmas To You) - Nat King Cole
[00:13.69]Chestnuts roasting on an open fire
[00:20.76]Jack Frost nipping at your nose
[00:27.77]Yuletide carols being sung by a choir
[00:34.36]And folks dressed up like Eskimos
[00:40.10]Everybody knows a turkey and some mistletoe
[00:48.97]Help to make the season bright
[00:56.21]Tiny tots with their eyes all aglow
[01:01.80]Will find it hard to sleep tonight
[01:08.48]They know that Santa's on his way
[01:15.33]He's loaded lots of toys and goodies on his sleigh
[01:21.88]And every mother's child is gonna spy
[01:28.64]To see if reindeer really know how to fly
[01:35.81]And so I'm offering this simple phrase
[01:44.00]To kids from one to ninety-two
[01:50.62]Although it's been said many times many ways
[01:56.23]Merry Christmas to you
[02:31.12]And so I'm offering this simple phrase
[02:40.06]To kids from one to ninety-two
[02:46.83]Although it's been said many times many ways
[02:52.75]Merry Christmas to you
data.trans:
[ti:Nat King Cole / The Christmas Song (Merry Christmas To You)]
[ar:Nat King Cole]
[al:Absolute Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.38]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:13.69]篝火上烤着栗子
[00:20.76]冰霜正刺骨地吹向你们的鼻子
[00:27.77]唱诗班正在唱着圣诞颂歌
[00:34.36]人们打扮得就像是爱斯基摩人
[00:40.10]人人都知道火鸡和槲寄生
[00:48.97]可以使圣诞更有气氛
[00:56.21]小孩们的眼里都闪着光
[01:01.80]今晚难以入睡
[01:08.48]他们知道圣诞老人已经在来的路上
[01:15.33]他在雪橇上装了很多的玩具和糖果
[01:21.88]每家的小孩都想去发现
[01:28.64]去看驯鹿是不是真的知道怎样飞
[01:35.81]于是我将这简单的话语
[01:44.00]送给一岁到九十二岁的孩子们
[01:50.62]尽管这句话已经以无数方式被说了无数次
[01:56.23]祝你圣诞快乐
[02:31.12]于是我将这简单的话语
[02:40.06]送给一岁到九十二岁的孩子们
[02:46.83]尽管这句话已经以无数方式被说了无数次
[02:52.75]祝你圣诞快乐
